messages.content: What does the ComfyUI-Minio plugin do?
The ComfyUI-Minio plugin is based on Minio and allows users to read images from Minio, save images to Minio, and facilitate expansion and connection across multiple machines.
What languages is the documentation available in?
The documentation is available in English and 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese).
What is the purpose of the Set Minio Config node?
The Set Minio Config node is used for the initialization of Minio configurations before using other nodes in the ComfyUI-Minio plugin.
What does the Load Image From Minio node do?
The Load Image From Minio node is used to read images from the Minio server.
What is the capability of the Save Image To Minio node?
The Save Image To Minio node allows saving images to the Minio server and supports saving multiple images.
How do you install the requirements for the ComfyUI-Minio plugin?
To install the requirements for the ComfyUI-Minio plugin, use the command 'pip install -r requirements.txt' in your terminal or command line.
What are the steps to initialize the ComfyUI-Minio plugin before use?

To initialize the ComfyUI-Minio plugin, you need to add the 'Set Minio Config' node, enter your Minio configuration information, run the plugin, and check for a created 'minio_config.json' file in the output directory.
How can I display JSON information within the ComfyUI-Minio plugin?
To display JSON information, you must install the [Comfyui-Toolbox](https://github.com/zcfrank1st/Comfyui-Toolbox) plugin.
What happens after successful Minio configuration?
After successful Minio configuration, you can proceed to use the Load Image From Minio and Save Image To Minio nodes as normal.
What is the primary functionality of the ComfyUI-Minio extension?
The ComfyUI-Minio extension enables reading and saving images from and to Minio, facilitating expansion and connection across multiple machines.
What is the purpose of the 'Set Minio Config' node?
The 'Set Minio Config' node initializes the Minio settings and is mandatory before utilizing the other nodes of the ComfyUI-Minio extension.
How does the 'Load Image From Minio' node function?
The 'Load Image From Minio' node retrieves images from Minio after setting up the Minio Config.
What is the function of the 'Save Image To Minio' node?
The 'Save Image To Minio' node stores images in Minio post configuring the Minio via the 'Set Minio Config' node and supports multiple image saves.
What dependencies are required for the ComfyUI-Minio extension?
The ComfyUI-Minio extension requires the installation of the minio Python SDK. The command to install is 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.
What are the initialization steps to use the ComfyUI-Minio extension?

To initialize, add the 'Set Minio Config' node, input your Minio configuration details, run the plugin. If the Minio setup is correct and the connection is successful, a 'minio_config.json' file will be generated in the 'output' directory of ComfyUI.
How can JSON information be visualized while using ComfyUI-Minio?
To view JSON information, install the [Comfyui-Toolbox](https://github.com/zcfrank1st/Comfyui-Toolbox) plugin.
What is the typical workflow when using the ComfyUI-Minio extension?

The workflow includes initializing via the 'Set Minio Config' node, setting up the Minio configuration, running the node, and checking 'minio_config.json'. Once configured, the 'Load Image From Minio' and 'Save Image To Minio' nodes can be used.
